text:
Clemenger BBDO has engaged Marcus Johnson to provide solutions for the Music World Launch Campaign on behalf of Music World. As consumers increasingly seek sustainable products, Australians are seeking better retail solutions. As the campaign's brand partner, Marcus Johnson will deliver primary content across media and social channels. This campaign reinforces the brand's leadership in retail.

INFLUENCER AGREEMENT

This agreement is between Music World and the Influencer for Music World Shopping Campaign 2025.

COMMERCIAL TERMS:
- Total Fee: $13,020 AUD (inclusive of GST)
- Payment Terms: Net 30 days from invoice date
- Invoice Requirements: Tax invoice required upon completion

DELIVERABLES:
- 2 x Instagram posts

TERMS AND CONDITIONS:
- Engagement Period: 4 months
- Exclusivity Period: 6 weeks
- Territory: Australia
- Usage Rights: 12 months from campaign launch
- Content Rights: Music World retains full commercial rights

COMPLIANCE:
- All content must comply with ACMA guidelines and ASA codes
- Content is subject to client approval before publication
- Disclosure requirements must be met per ACCC guidelines

LEGAL:
This agreement is governed by Australian law and subject to the jurisdiction of Australian courts.

Agreed terms are subject to final contract execution.
labels: profile_AMAZON _ PBDD Talent Agreement - Jackie Gillies DRAFT  (1)
